title: God Save The Queen - Sex Pistols
content:
Hi can anyone identify the typefaces used for “God Save The Queen” or at the very least identify the type used for “GOD”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121152643im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pistols_6662.jpg)

Thanks!

 [‹ Matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121152643/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44405 "Go to previous forum topic") [Neptune type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121152643/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44415 "Go to next forum topic")
author: McDung

comments.content:
“GOD” - Clarendon Black Condensed?  
“Save” - Gill Sans Heavy  
“THE QUEEN” - Tempo (Heavy Condensed?)

- Lex
